loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! A verification email has been sent.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred brew, its origins, and how it facilitates deep healing and spiritual connection.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet our experienced facilitators who create a safe, supportive, and compassionate space for your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find our guidelines for diet, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay connected with us on our social networks for updates, testimonials, and inspiration.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive brew from the Amazon, made by combining the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). It has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for spiritual and healing purposes.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew's active components induce an altered state of consciousness, allowing for deep introspection, emotional release, and connection with the subconscious. This process can lead to profound personal insights and healing.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches and guides. It helps individuals confront and resolve deep-seated emotional and psychological issues, offering a path to greater self-awareness and spiritual growth.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many participants report gaining a clearer sense of their life's purpose and direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The experience often facilitates the release of past traumas and emotional blockages.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It can foster a profound sense of connection to oneself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared experience, where the collective energy supports and enhances each individual's journey. Ideal for those seeking connection and community.
privateCeremonyDescription: A personalized and intimate experience tailored to your specific intentions and needs. Offers a focused setting for deep, individual work.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated team that will support and guide you through your healing journey with wisdom, compassion, and experience.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content, users, and settings.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information and image.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Proper preparation is essential for a safe, deep, and transformative experience. Follow these guidelines to prepare your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: You register and fill out the medical questionnaire to ensure the experience is safe for you.
ceremonyProcessDescription: You participate in the sacred ritual, guided by our expert facilitators in a safe and supportive environment.
experienceProcessDescription: You navigate your inner world, release emotions, and receive the understandings that the medicine has for you.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you so you can apply the lessons learned in your daily life and continue your growth.
dietSubtitle: We recommend following these dietary guidelines for at least 3-5 days before and after the ceremony to cleanse your body.
allowedFoodsList:
• Fresh fruits and vegetables
• Grains (rice, quinoa, oats)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Lean proteins (chicken, fish)
• Water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat (especially pork)
• Fermented foods
• Spicy or heavily seasoned foods
• Dairy products
• Sugar and processed sweets
• Caffeine and alcohol
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset and intentions are fundamental to the experience. Here are some recommended practices.
meditationDescription: Spend at least 15 minutes a day meditating to calm your mind and connect with your breath. This will help you navigate the experience with more serenity.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what brings you to the medicine. What do you wish to heal? What questions are you seeking answers to? Write down your intentions to give direction to your journey.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony. It will be a valuable tool for later integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring deep-seated and repressed emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel without judgment. The ceremony is a safe space to release what no longer serves you. Trust the process and the guidance of our facilitators.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and meaningful night.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable, layered clothing in light or white colors.
• A blanket and a pillow.
• A water bottle.
• A notebook and pen for journaling afterwards.
essentialsList:
• An open mind and heart.
• Your personal intentions.
• A spirit of respect for the medicine, the facilitators, and the other participants.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Please sign in or create an account to access the preparation guide and questionnaire.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies scheduled at this time. Please check back later or contact us for more information.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not registered for any upcoming ceremonies. Explore our events to find your next journey.

noCoursesInCategory: There are no courses in this category at the moment.
